publicationStmt.publisher: printed for R. Parker, at the Unicorn under the piazza of the Royal Exchange in Cornhil; Peter Buck, at the sign of the Temple at the middle-Temple-Gate in Fleetstreet; and are to be sold by R. Baldwin in VVarwick lane,

notesStmt.note: Running title: An idyll on the peace.
